title: GDPR Data Deletion Audit
description: A GRC analyst must audit the process for handling 'right to be forgotten' requests to ensure compliance with GDPR.

tasks.description: Select a random sample of recent data deletion requests from the ticketing system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst selects a representative sample of requests.

tasks.description: For each request, trace the process to ensure the user's data was deleted from all relevant systems (e.g., CRM, marketing database, backups).
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst follows the data trail to verify deletion across multiple systems.

tasks.description: Document any findings where data was not properly deleted and create a corrective action plan to fix the process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst identifies a gap in the process (backups were not wiped) and creates a plan to fix it.
